caption: This photograph features a row of nine fish, each suspended from their tails, displayed in a descending left to right manner. The fish vary in color from pale yellow to deep pink, and they are photographed against a dark background, emphasizing the vividness of their scales and textures. Each fish carries a small piece of paper attached to its body with a rubber band; the papers each display a hand-drawn symbol that appears distinctive for each fish. The image projects a blend of biological documentation and artistic interpretation, suggesting that these fish might be part of a scientific study or an artistic exhibit. The overall composition of the photograph is carefully arranged, creating a compelling and somewhat surreal visual sequence of marine life.
title: Fish auction is a daily event.
